 2022-03322022-04-04,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Ian F. Leach ** Leave of Absence **
PrecisOrder granting of a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to the HONOURABLE IAN F. LEACH, a Judge of the Superior Court of Ontario, from his judicial duties from December 10, 2021 until June 10, 2022, on account of ill-health.
AttachmentsAttachment
